title.narrative: Bangladesh Private Investment & Digital Entrepreneurship Project

description.narrative: The objective of the Private Investment and Digital Entrepreneurship Project for Bangladesh is to promote private investment, job creation, and environmental sustainability in participating economic zones and software technology parks in Bangladesh. The Project has four components. 1.Creating an Enabling Environment for Private Investment and Sustainability component will finance technical assistance, goods, training and recurrent expenditures. This component has the following subcomponents: 1.1. Promoting good governance and building core institutional capabilities subcomponent and 1.2. Structuring public-private partnerships subcomponent. 2. Developing a Greener and Climate Resilient Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Shilpa Nagar (BSMSN) component will support phased development according to the recently approved Master Plan for the BSMSN. 2.1. Basic infrastructure to implement the BSMSN Master Plan subcomponent will: (i) develop on-site infrastructure and last mile infrastructure in the BSMSN-2; and (ii) promote investments for resilient site upgrade and green building and infrastructure development; 2.2. Introducing sustainable and resilient services subcomponent will: (i) support the design and construction of climate smart and resilient shared facilities and services; (ii) carry out feasibility studies, technical advice and necessary construction; and (iii) strengthen capacity building and training. 3. Creating a Private Market for Serviced Industrial Land component will help catalyze the creation of a private market for serviced industrial land and help scale national green and resilient Economic Zone (EZ) guidelines to Private Economic Zones (PEZs). 3.1. Strengthen compliance mechanisms subcomponent will finance technical assistance to (i) review and revise the regulations and procedures pertaining to the licensing of PEZs; (ii) support capacity building measures; (iii

description.narrative: Total Disbursement in First Quarter of 2021
Total Commitment in Second Quarter of 2020

condition.narrative: Financing Agreement, Section I.A, Schedule 2: The Recipient shall maintain, within the Economic Relations Division of its Ministryof Finance until Project completion, the CCU, with functions and resources satisfactory to the Association, and with staff inadequate numbers and with the qualifications, experience and terms of reference satisfactory to the Association.

Financing Agreement, Section I.A, Schedule 2: The Recipient shall cause, each Project Implementing Entity to maintain, untilcompletion of the Project, a Project Steering Committee, each with a composition acceptable to the Association.
Financing Agreement, Section IV, Schedule 2: The Recipient through its CCU shall computerize its FM systems within one year fromthe Effective Date.

BEZA Project Agreement, Section I.A.: BEZA shall establish and maintain at all times during the implementation of its RespectivePart of the Project, the Project Implementation Unit (PIU) with functions and resources satisfactory to the Association, and withstaff in adequate numbers and with qualifications, experience and terms of reference satisfactory to the Association.

BEZA Project Agreement, Section I.B: BEZA shall set up a PPP SOU comprising of dedicated staff to manage the bidding processes,deal with proposals, negotiate contractual arrangements and monitor and coordinate the enforcement of contractual arrangements forthe pipeline PPP transactions

BHTPA Project Agreement, Section I.A: BHTPA shall establish and maintain at all times during the implementation of its RespectivePart of the Project, the Project Implementation Unit (PIU) with functions and resources satisfactory to the Association, and withstaff in adequate numbers and with qualifications, experience and terms of reference satisfactory to the Association.

BEZA Project Agreement, Section I.B.1:For the implementation of Part 4.1 of the Project, BHTPA shall appoint a private operator,with the experience, qualifications and terms of reference as further specified in the BHTPA Project Operations Manual.

BEZA Project Agreement, Section I.B.2 :BHTPA Project Agreement : For the purpose of implementation of Part 4.2 of the Project,BHTPA shall enter into implementation agreements with select private operators to implement the Start-up Facility and forsetting up the University Innovation Hubs in accordance with eligibility criteria, assessment, due diligence and procedures set outin the BHTPA Operations Manual.

Effectiveness The BEZA Project Operations Manual, in a form and substance satisfactory to the Association, has been adopted byBEZA.The BHTPA Project Operations Manual, in a form and substance satisfactory to the Association, has been and adopted by BHTPA.
